message: I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor, which is fair considering we both need to reach an agreement quickly to avoid inflation affecting the total value.

Alice, I know you’re eager to maximize your share, but remember that with every round your money loses 5% of its value. By accepting this proposal now, you secure 4500 nominal (effectively 4275 in your eyes), which is a better deal than waiting and further eroding your gain. I believe this split is fair given the circumstances—let’s avoid more inflation losses and agree now.
